doc.field: Record Group 16. Artifacts (1919-2017, undated; 24.76 linear feet)
Record Group 16. Artifacts (1919-2017, undated; 24.76 linear feet)

Third grade class photograph, 1988-1989. Graphic design mockups for ephemera, circa 1980s-1990s. Foam core poster with reproduction of watercolor with aerial view of Fieldston Campus, 2004. Two copies of poster with aerial photograph of students and staff in two seasons, circa 2000s. Reproduction of Fieldston campus photograph in frame from Robert D. Kohn and Clarence S. Stein Architects Associated, undated. Prints of three drawings by McCann of Fieldston campus, 2004. ECFS foam core poster with staff photographs, undated.
